DataElement.preferredName: Data Monitoring Committee Responsibility Document Version Number Text ISO21090.ST.SIMPLE.v1.0
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A key document that, together with the study protocol and Statistical Analysis Plan (SAP), prospectively defines the study's Data Monitoring Committee (DMC) infrastructure and, in particular, the DMC's responsibilities; stipulates who sees blinded results and who sees unblinded results; and establishes a method for communication between the DMC and the sponsor. A character string that identifies a given collection of content of a document at a point in time. EXAMPLE(S): Could be an integer starting at 1, incrementing by 1, with version number incremented by 1 when a version is replaced, but can also be incremented more often to meet local requirements. NOTE(S): Different versions of same document belong to same document group. Over time, there may be multiple changes to document; allows capture of relationships between changes in instances of document over time; can be new version every time content changes.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Data Monitoring Committee Responsibility Document Version Number Text
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A collection or single item of factual information, derived from measurement or research, from which conclusions may be drawn.:The act of observing something (and sometimes keeping a record of it).:A group delegated to consider some matter; a self-constituted organization to promote something.:A duty, obligation, or burden; something for which one is responsible.:A physical object, or electronic counterpart, that is characterized by containing writing which is meant to be human-readable.:A form or variant of a type or original; one of a sequence of copies of a program, each incorporating new modifications._Number; a concept of quantity derived from zero and units; a numeral or string of numerals that is used for identification.:Text; the words of something written.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Data Monitoring Committee Responsibility Document Version
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A collection or single item of factual information, derived from measurement or research, from which conclusions may be drawn.:The act of observing something (and sometimes keeping a record of it).:A group delegated to consider some matter; a self-constituted organization to promote something.:A duty, obligation, or burden; something for which one is responsible.:A physical object, or electronic counterpart, that is characterized by containing writing which is meant to be human-readable.:A form or variant of a type or original; one of a sequence of copies of a program, each incorporating new modifications.

Concepts.definition: A collection or single item of factual information, derived from measurement or research, from which conclusions may be drawn.
The act of observing something (and sometimes keeping a record of it).
A group delegated to consider matters concerning clinical studies or trials.
A duty, obligation, or burden; something for which one is responsible.
A physical object, or electronic counterpart, that is characterized by containing writing which is meant to be human-readable.
A form or variant of a type or original; one of a sequence of copies of a program, each incorporating new modifications.

Property.preferredDefinition: Number; a concept of quantity derived from zero and units; a numeral or string of numerals that is used for identification.:Text; the words of something written.

Concepts.definition: A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Constrains ST.NT so that it has no language.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Health Informatics - Harmonized data types for information interchange

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Text; the words of something written.
